name: mmx-mcp-server
description: MCP server for automating MMX Systems form filling with Google Sheets data

scripts.build: tsc && node -e "const fs=require('fs'),p=require('path');const d=p.join('build','dashboard');fs.mkdirSync(d,{recursive:true});fs.copyFileSync(p.join('src','dashboard','dashboard.html'),p.join(d,'dashboard.html'));console.log('Copied dashboard.html to build/dashboard/')"
